extensionDescription.message: Copy work hours from Hilan timesheet to Malam payroll system

defaultTitle.description: Default title for the extension action

guidanceTextDefault.message: Please navigate to Hilan timesheet or Malam payroll website.
guidanceTextDefault.description: Default guidance text for unknown websites

guidanceTextSource.message: Step 1: Click "Auto-Click" to reveal time boxes, then "Copy Hours" to copy data.
guidanceTextSource.description: Guidance text for Hilan timesheet page

guidanceTextTarget.message: Step 2: Click "Paste Hours" to sync your copied timesheet data.
guidanceTextTarget.description: Guidance text for Malam payroll page

copyHours.description: Copy hours button text for Hilan

pasteHours.description: Paste hours button text for Malam

contextHilan.description: Context name for general Hilan website pages

contextHilanTimesheet.description: Context name for Hilan timesheet pages where operations are enabled

statLastCopied.description: Statistics label for last copied timestamp

statLastPasted.description: Statistics label for last pasted timestamp

statLastAutoClick.description: Statistics label for last auto-click timestamp

statTotalOperations.description: Statistics label for total operations count

statSuccessRate.description: Statistics label for success rate percentage

statNever.description: Statistics value for never performed operations

errorExtensionDisabled.message: Extension is disabled. Please enable it in the extension popup.
errorExtensionDisabled.description: Error message when extension is disabled

errorWrongSite.message: This feature is not available on the current website.

errorNoData.message: No timesheet data found. Please ensure you are on the correct page.
errorNoData.description: Error message when no data is found

errorInProgress.message: Another operation is in progress. Please wait.
errorInProgress.description: Error message when operation is in progress

errorNoTimeBoxes.message: No clickable time boxes found. Make sure you are on the Hilan timesheet calendar page.
errorNoTimeBoxes.description: Error when no time boxes found for auto-click

workingClearing.description: Working message for clear data operation

successCleared.message: All extension data has been cleared successfully.
successCleared.description: Success message for clear data operation

errorClearDataFailed.description: Error message when clearing data fails

successLanguageChanged.description: Success message when language is switched

errorLanguageSwitchFailed.description: Error message when language switch fails

errorOperationTimedOut.message: Operation timed out - please try again
errorOperationTimedOut.description: Error message when operation times out

errorCommunicationIssue.message: Communication issue - operation may have succeeded
errorCommunicationIssue.description: Error message when communication fails but operation might have succeeded

errorOperationFailed.description: Generic error message prefix for failed operations

timeFormatJustNow.description: Timestamp format for very recent actions

footerMadeBy.description: Footer text showing the extension creator

extensionEnabled.description: Toggle label for extension enabled state

extensionDisabled.description: Toggle label for extension disabled state

statistics.description: Statistics section title and toggle label

modalMessage.message: This will delete all statistics, timesheet data, and settings permanently.

successCopied.message: Successfully copied $COUNT$ entries from Hilan timesheet

successPasted.message: Successfully pasted $COUNT$ entries to Malam timesheet
